display_name.description: A human-readable name or title to display

screen_rect.title: Screen Rect
screen_rect.description: The rectangle describing the desktop location and size of this screen, given as x,y,width,height, e.g. 0,0,1920,1080

working_rect.title: Working Area Rect
working_rect.description: The rectangle describing the desktop Working Area of this screen (usually defined as the screen area without the Taskbar), given as x,y,width,height, e.g. 0,0,1920,1040

items.title: Screen
items.description: A Screen that is part of the Screen Layout

screens.title: Screens
screens.description: Array of Screens that make up the Screen Layout

primaryScreen.title: Primary Screen
primaryScreen.description: A number specifying which of the defined screens is the Primary
